entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 70 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
